Text:
Dear Mac.moe... Please know that I created an account and logged in JUST to THANK YOU for continuing to offer these wonderful programmes what I miss so much.

Rest assured that for every "thank you" that you receive, there are dozens of grateful recipients that appreciate your efforts.

What a wonderful comment, thank you.

It's a pity that I have no way of knowing how mny take downloads, I just have to depend on pirate feedback.
